mapper.select: select a.id,a.content,a.image1,a.image2,a.image3,b.userName,b.introduction,b.avatar from confessionWall a,oridinaryUser b where id=a.id and b.userId=a.userId
mapper.insert: insert into confessionWall(userId, content, image1, image2, image3) values(#{userId},#{content},#{image1},#{image2},#{image3})
